page.title: 17Arts and the Arts Festival
page.content:
There is a Floral Society and Drama Club. The local History Society and Library group are particularly interested in the locality. The thriving Art Society and Camera Club provide programmes of lectures, demonstrations and seminars.
Every year there is an{Arts {Festival.}This year it begins on June the 29th and lasts for a fortnight.There are photographic and Art Exhibitions and a Flower Festival. There will be recitals (by the Welsh Brass Trio,Helen Field and local musicians),a play by Michael Pertwee and a Youth Musical Extravaganza of Pop, Rock, Jazz and vocal groups. In October there is a Young Composers' forum and Young Musicians' Competition and concert.
